title: rustc: error while loading shared libraries: libnative-4e7c5e5c.so
body:
env centos 6.5
 curl -s https://static.rust-lang.org/rustup.sh | sudo sh install rust
when execute rustc get follow output

rustc: error while loading shared libraries: libnative-4e7c5e5c.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

but when I use cmd following
$cd /usr/local/lib
$ll 
find it in the "/usr/local/lib" directory
drwxr-xr-x  3 root mock     4096 6月  24 11:02 byobu
drwxr-xr-x  2 root mock     4096 10月 13 16:21 cargo
drwxr-xr-x  3 root root     4096 9月  23 16:54 checkinstall
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root root    43072 12月 22 2009 installwatch.so
-rw-r--r--  1 root mock    61583 10月 13 16:21 libarena-4e7c5e5c.so
-rw-r--r--  1 root mock   150067 10月 13 16:21 libdebug-4e7c5e5c.so
-rw-r--r--  1 root mock   134051 10月 13 16:21 libflate-4e7c5e5c.so
-rw-r--r--  1 root mock    72231 10月 13 16:21 libfmt_macros-4e7c5e5c.so
-rw-r--r--  1 root mock   166582 10月 13 16:21 libgetopts-4e7c5e5c.so
-rw-r--r--  1 root mock    55244 10月 13 16:21 libgraphviz-4e7c5e5c.so

-rw-r--r--  1 root mock   518880 10月 13 16:21 libnative-4e7c5e5c.so
-r-xr-xr-x  1 root mock 10302182 8月  19 17:28 libpython2.7.a
-rw-r--r--  1 root mock   244330 10月 13 16:21 librbml-4e7c5e5c.so
